dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I suggest we focus on gathering information about each other's alibis and behaviors during the night to help us identify the assassin. Let's be vigilant and open about our actions to build trust within our group.

dialogue.message: I agree with Alice, let's share our whereabouts and actions during the night to build trust and ensure we can all feel safe in this game. I was at the docks, meditating and reflecting on the group dynamic.
